早期的ACL手术可能会降低膝关节骨关节炎的风险HSS研究人员的一项临床前研究发现，与延迟手术相比，早期的前交叉韧带（ACL）重建导致免疫细胞活性降低，炎症较少，关节变化较少，而与膝关节骨关节炎相比，与膝关节骨关节炎相比较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-os-of-knee-osteoarhthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-ok-ok-ok-ok-osteoarthrothitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf7cd12-6ff3-6ff3-4f6f-82db-0f97428d5751 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:31:57 -0400 Earlier ACL surgery may reduce risk of knee osteoarthritis
来自具有特殊寿命的家庭的人患动脉疾病的风险较低一份新的研究论文于2025年2月25日在《衰老》（老化）中发表，第17卷，第2期，标题为“长期生活家庭研究中外周血血管健康测量的流行病学和遗传确定”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/people-from-families-with-exceptional-longevity-have-have-have-lower-lower----------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/people-from-families-with-exceptional-longevity-have-have-have-lower-lower-rower--------------------------------------- xusease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2040C974-2076-4A2F-866F-289EC71A456B Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:27:46 -0400 People from families with exceptional longevity have lower risk of peripheral artery disease
痴呆症风险在马拉维艾滋病毒的成年人中较高根据美国和马拉维研究人员的一项新研究，与没有艾滋病毒的成年人相比，与没有艾滋病毒的成年人同时患有痴呆症的可能性也两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/dementia-risk-higher-among-ag------------hiv-in-malawi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/dementia-risk-higher-among-among-adults-with-hiv-in-malawi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A52BE38F-D06C-440E-A715-693F7D25D25DCBF Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:23:36 -0400 Dementia risk higher among adults with HIV in Malawi
口服抗病毒药物被证明成功地预防家庭成员有症状的covid-19一项国际临床试验已经确定了一种可以帮助防止家庭中暴露于家庭的人的症状性互联的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/oral-antiviral-drug-proves-successful-in-priventing-symbastomation-covid-covid-covid-covid-19-in-household-members.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/oral-antiviral-antiviral-drug-proves-successuccessful-in-preventing-symbmentasmentasmant-covid-covid-19-in Household-Members.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1Adc635e-df93-4627-9806-3bac4a9543ec Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:19:26 -0400

一种创新的方法为制药行业提供了开创性的移动机器人与STERIMOVE见面，这是专为A/B/C/D级清洁室设计的创新移动机器人，优化了药物生产，同时最大程度地降低了污染风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/an-innovative-pablecrace-results-in-a-a-grount-mobile-mobile-for-for-the-pharmaceutical-indusry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/an-innovative-pablecrace-results-in-a-a- grount-mobile-mobile-mobot-for-the-pharmaceutical-industry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f19ac783-e858-4c35-a9f8-7d8a67564a2f Wed, 12 Mar 2025 12:59:00 -0400 An innovative approach results in a groundbreaking mobile robot for the pharmaceutical industry
跨性别者和性别多样的人在精神病住院后面临较低的随访率与普通人群相比，因精神病治疗而住院的跨性别和性别多样化的人不太可能进行随访，这表明他们面临医院系统中的恐惧症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/transgender-and-gender-diverse-istividals-face-face-lower-face-lower-follow-follow-follow-follow-follow-pollow-per---------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/transgender-and-gender-diverse-istividuals-face-face-lower-face-lower-follow-follow-follow-follow-pollow-pollow-pollow-per------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B07A2EDD-AA9C-4319-8F3F-36DADDAD1094759 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 12:41:57 -0400 Transgender and gender diverse individuals face lower follow-up rates after psychiatric hospitalization
开发的新设备可非侵入性分解肾结石A team from the Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) and the Spanish National Research Council (CSIC), belonging to the Research Institute for Molecular Imaging Technologies (I3M), has developed, together with the NITIUV Group of the La Fe Health Research Institute (IIS La Fe) in Valencia and the Biomechanics Institute of Valencia, a new device - in the prototype phase - to break up kidney stones. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-device-developed to-non-invasively-bureb up-up-up-kidney-stones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-device-developed to-non-invasively-bureb up-up-up-kidney-stones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6A5D5B0-8207-4F38-B6CE-EA693AC24297 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 12:13:45 -0400 New device developed to non-invasively break up kidney stones
腰围比比BMI更准确地检测儿童肥胖症一项新研究显示，体重指数（BMI）将儿童分类为超重的可能性几乎是腰围对高比率的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/waist-to-height-ratio-more-accurate-than-bmi-for-detectecting-childhood-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/waist-to-height-ratio-more-accurate-than-tan-bmi-for-detectecting-childhood-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4DBDC671-1825-43B6-BBA3-5B491D304676 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 10:32:42 -0400 Waist-to-height ratio more accurate than BMI for detecting childhood obesity
